<parties id="b308-18">NATIONAL LABOR RELATIONS BOARD, Petitioner, v. ARKANSAS RICE GROWERS COOPERATIVE ASS’N.</parties>
<docketnumber id="b308-20">No. 14973.</docketnumber>
<court id="b308-21">United States Court of Appeals, Eighth Circuit.</court>
<decisiondate id="b308-22">Dec. 9, 1953.</decisiondate>
<attorneys id="b308-24">David P. Findling, Assoc. Gen. Counsel, and A. Norman Somers, Asst. Gen. Counsel, National Labor Relations Board, Washington, D. C., for petitioner.</attorneys>
<attorneys id="b308-26">John L. Daggett, Marianna, Ark., for respondent.</attorneys>
<opinion>[NO OPINION]</opinion></casebody>
